definitions.definition: An old musical note , equal to two longas , four breves , or eight semibreves .

examples: Getting a car tricked out like that will cost you 50 large .

definitions.definition: One of several common sizes to which an item may be manufactured.
definitions.label_groups: uncountable , especially clothing , food or drink

definitions.definition: An item labelled or denoted as being that size.
examples: One small coffee and two larges , please.
definitions.label_groups: countable , especially clothing , food or drink

definitions.definition: One who fits an item of that size.
definitions.label_groups: countable , especially with respect to clothing

main_definition: ( music , obsolete ) An old musical note , equal to two longas , four breves , or eight semibreves .
secondary_definitions: ( slang , plural: large ) A thousand dollars / pounds .
( uncountable , especially clothing , food or drink ) One of several common sizes to which an item may be manufactured.
( countable , especially clothing , food or drink ) An item labelled or denoted as being that size.
( countable , especially with respect to clothing ) One who fits an item of that size.
